com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2

Class GameRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2.GameRules

  • class GameRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jo√£o on 28/09/2016. Contains static methods that are to be changed if the rules of the game change, like if there's a new kind of piece.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameRules() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static boolean movable(BoardPiece piece, Board board)
      This method is used to decide if trying to select one piece will work or not.
      (package private) static void setGameOverState(Board board)
      Sets the state of the provided Board to Win if there is no cake, to Lose if there is cake and no more moves, and Continue in any other case.
      (package private) static boolean testValidMotion(Board board, int touchedX, int touchedY)
      This method is used to decide if a movement is valid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameRules

        GameRules()

    • Method Detail

      • setGameOverState

        static void setGameOverState(Board board)
        Sets the state of the provided Board to Win if there is no cake, to Lose if there is cake and no more moves, and Continue in any other case.
        Parameters:
        board - The Board to test for game over.

      • testValidMotion

        static boolean testValidMotion(Board board,
                               int touchedX,
                               int touchedY)
        This method is used to decide if a movement is valid. Must be changed if a new kind of piece is introduced. Now it allows motion if it is from a NormalBoardPiece to either another one or a blank space, and if it is in a place next door vertically or horizontally.
        Parameters:
        board - The board containing the pieces and info on the selection.
        touchedX - X coordinate of the place the piece should be moved to.
        touchedY - Y coordinate of the place the piece should be moved to.
        Returns:
        True if it is a valid motion.

      • movable

        static boolean movable(BoardPiece piece,
                       Board board)
        This method is used to decide if trying to select one piece will work or not. Currently, if it is an normal piece, returns true, in any other case returns false. This method must be changed if a new kind of piece is introduced.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece bing tested.
        board - The board for context.
        Returns:
        True if the piece can be selected.
